TopicTitle: Cant place solar panels into containers

Articles.Content:
So here is my issue: I have a 1000l KIS container on my spacecraft, but i cant place any solar panels into the container, no matter if its a modded or basic solar I simply cant place it inside. I can place basically anything inside it even modded stuff but not solar panels.Exception detector says the following when I try to place a solar inside the container:

USITools

 USITools_PulseDrive.OnAwake: 2

SigmaBinary

 SigmaBinaryPlugin.Components.SigmaBinary.Start: 1

KerbalAlarmClock

 KerbalAlarmClock.KerbalAlarmClock.OnGUIEvery: 2

ConnectedLivingSpace

 ConnectedLivingSpace.CLSAddon.RebuildCLSVessel: 2

KIS

 KIS.KIS_Shared.CleanupFieldsInModule: (the slot number i try to place the solar in)

The spacecraft consists of a drone core, some structural elements, a few antennas and the container.

Any ideas or fixes about this bug?
